I have, until now, been conflicted about those interests. Impeachment, along with the right to declare war, is the most awesome power of Congress. /5
From the moment of his inauguration, this President has shown contempt for the truth, has attacked our institutions, and has ignored the Constitution he swore to defend. /4
But there are moments for calculation. For prudence, compromise and the careful weighing of competing interests. And there are moments for clarity and conviction. This is such a moment. /3
